name: Tau Ceti: The Special Edition
overview: A space simulation with elements from a number of other genres mixed in. Your mission is to destroy a robot army that has taken over a planet. Gameplay includes arcade sequences, where you fly your ship around and shoot the enemy robots; strategy elements, as you attempt to navigate and locate parts to repair the defense system; and even text-adventure elements, in the form of giving commands to your ship's computer. This enhanced version was released for the 128K Spectrum in 1987 and features extra graphics and a larger amount of accessible library data about the game world.
